channel.title: New to axoloti, hello! Got some questions
channel.description:
Hello everyone,
I want to order my first Axoloti in about 2 day's. Only now it seems I can only pay with a credit card, and paypall didn't work :S
But about the board, I've read a lot of things already, but I can't seem to find out wich type of potentiometer I need to use to work well with the board.
Thanks in advance

item.title: New to axoloti, hello! Got some questions
item.dc:creator: @alainkalender alain
item.description:
@alainkalender wrote:

Cool, thanks for the quick reply!

I will msg him.

Ahh nice, already orderd some of those pots so that's nice. I am working on u big project with this thing.
Already did order like 20 pair of those male and female 40pins so it will all look and function nice.

Read full topic
item.source: New to axoloti, hello! Got some questions

item.title: New to axoloti, hello! Got some questions
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

hi, and welcome
billing etc, your best to DM @johannes directly if there is an issue.

pots - I think most use 10k Linear, see this post for some suggestions.... also you can search the forum, and you'll find more suggestions.

EDIT: btw, make sure you also have some header pins (details in above post) as the axo board is 'bare' and you don't want to be soldering directly to the board. (male or female is personal choice, just get the matching jumper cables)

Read full topic
item.source: New to axoloti, hello! Got some questions
